column3: MAX_BLOCK_BASE_SIZE is defined as `1000000` in [consensus.h](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/consensus/consensus.h#L16). With these changes it will be defined as the same in [mininode.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9206/files#diff-4e2c48df3a0e77613363203912f92c46R47).\n\nRan the test suite and checked that all occurrences of MAX_BLOCK_SIZE (except for a single one
